home.description: Welcome, we are happy to see you again.
home.safe-place: You are in a safe place, if you are unable to go where you want, you need permissions to see some things. Check your {permissions} to see what you have access to.
home.active-servers-info: You can run tasks on multiple servers simultaneously, such as uploading files. Open a server, go back to that page and open another one together.
home.active-servers-click-top-right: Click the in the {icon} icon in the upper right corner to see more.
home.server-list-fetch-error: Unable to load the server list.

game-library.title: Game Library
game-library.description: Games from your library can be used to create new servers. It is possible to manually configure games by editing their respective files, present in the {path} folder in the root directory.
game-library.new-games: You can add more games created by the community to your library. Learn more about creating and registering games in the Katan {docs}.
game-library.click-to-see-game-details: Click on a game to view details of its configuration.

accounts.title: Users
accounts.description: Users (or accounts) have strictly defined permissions and roles that can be changed here. You can only change users with roles below yours or with unassigned roles.
accounts.server-description: Server-specific permissions are on the settings page for the respective servers. Here you will find only permissions linked to general account access to the panel areas.

settings.title: User Settings
settings.description: Depending on the version of your client ({version}), some configurations may be in the testing phase or badly of the legs, therefore, they may not work as they should or as you expect.
settings.description-detail: If you are the Bigfoot or notice something strange happening, contact the site administrators.

reset-settings.title: Turn over all settings
reset-settings.description: Reset your settings to the navigator's default if you are not satisfied with them, this will cause all adjustments made by you previously to be undone. Like a new born.

appearence.title: Look and Feel
appearence.theme-system-default: If you don't define a preferred theme, the system default will be used.

performance.title: Performance
performance.description: Adjust small details in the performance of the Katan in relation to the use of resources so that it does not impact the use of your machine or browser.

server-resources-update-rate.title: Server resources update rate
server-resources-update-rate.description: Time interval the client (you) will ask the server for information about an server's CPU usage, RAM memory and network statistics.
server-resources-update-rate.define-x-seconds: Set the time interval (up to {max} seconds).

errors.500: Could not connect to the server.
errors.Network Error: Could not connect to the server.
errors.Unsupported: Your version of the server does not support this functionality.

Server Error.title: Could not connect to the server
Server Error.description: Check if the server is started and configured correctly.
Server Error.persistence: If the problem persists, {0} to learn how to install and configure the Katan web server.
